display_long_description:
Avatar Mech is a single player and multiplayer mech-robot arena game designed specifically for VR. You can use the controller to move two arms of the mech through an exoskeleton system when sitting inside the mech's cockpit.

In each battle, you can form a team of [1 vs 1] up to [4 vs 4], with AI players or real players. Control your mech and fight with other mechs and robots beside your teammates. You can join voice chat with your team. You can also play in single player mode, by playing with all AIs.

The game features special VR features that allow players to play mech games in a completely new way. You can customize your mech with different weapons and switch to the mech's arm shield to block attacks: guns and rockets for long distances, axes for close combat. The mech's hands are completely freely controlled by the pilot's hands, which is you!

Experience different battle maps: from modern cities, desolate deserts to icy white snow. You can participate in intense and exciting battles, conquer the matches with your friends and become the number one mech player!
